title: Caesars Palace type
content:
Can anyone suggest a type face to replicate the Caesars Palace type; that sort of, Greco/Roman vibe?

Thanks,

Lee
author: Lee H

comments.content:
If you're not looking for an exact match

[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=lithos](http://web.archive.org/web/20141115190419/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=lithos "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=lithos")

or Las Vegas to Rome from the Casino Buffet font set on

[http://www.fontdiner.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141115190419/http:/www.fontdiner.com/ "http://www.fontdiner.com/")
if your budget is slim, try [Dalek](http://web.archive.org/web/20141115190419/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=dalek&nb_ppp_old=10&page=1&text=Ceasar%27s+Palace&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha) (it's free).

Thanks all. Very helpful stuff.

Lee
